name: Sunken Horrors
description:
• Tap spacebar - jump
  • Hold spacebar - swim (briefly)
  • Arrow keys - run left/right

Your submarine has crashed!

Put on your diving suit, explore the deep corners of the Atlantic, bear witness to the horrors that lurk in the void of the universe, and escape a certain death to warn humanity’s governments of what’s going on at the ocean floor! But you better pick up the pace, your air supply seems to be decreasing faster than it should be, and that strange humming in the radio equipment is perhaps the most unsettling sound you’ve ever heard... Like whispers from another dimension.

Those before you...

It seems like your crew wasn’t the first to crash here… corpses, shipwrecks, and even some diaries are sprawled around this area. It seems like an underwater aberration with psychic powers has brought many people to an early grave here - and it is growing larger with every passing day. Perhaps your submarine’s wreckage was no accident! You can feel that staying here isn’t a great idea - better get to climbing.

Will you be another corpse... or a survivor?

You’ll have to face many challenges to survive this wreckage - mutated aquatic animals more akin to monsters than they are to natural sealife, deadly mines constructed from scrap metal and scavenged electronics, and the wrath of a cosmic monstrosity bent on corrupting this world. The fate of the earth rests on your will to survive, sailor. Good luck!

Story/Lore by Alvar Mallo

Music/Sound by Zeffen https://ntakelemekonnen.wixsite.com/portfolio

Lin Virtual (Geminaurum#4631)

Additional graphics by Linda Roethlin (LadyIcepaw) https://ladyicepaw.itch.io/

Programming/Coordination by Jacob Gantt
